Panglima TNI Minta Mabes TNI di Penajam dan Modernisasi Alutsista
06 Nov 2019, 22:43 by Miechell Octovy Koagouw



Panglima TNI Minta Mabes TNI di Penajam dan Modernisasi Alutsista



Panglima TNI Minta Mabes TNI di Penajam dan Modernisasi Alutsista


KBRN, Jakarta : Panglima TNI Marsekal Hadi Tjahjanto didampingi Kepala Staf AD (KSAD) Jenderal TNI Andika Perkasa, Kepala Staf AL (KSAL) Laksamana TNI Siwi Sukma Adji, serta Kepala Staf AU (KSAU) Marsekal TNI Yuyu Sutisna, menghadiri Rapat Dengar Pendapat (RDP) dengan Komisi I DPR RI.Dalam kesempatan RDP, Rabu (6/11/2019) siang, Panglima TNI memaparkan konsep sistem pertahanan di Ibu Kota Negara baru yang harus dipersiapkan dengan matang. Sebab, ia melihat jika harus menghadapi situasi perang, Ibu Kota akan menjadi sasaran serangan musuh. Selain itu, dipaparkan pula sejumlah alutsista yang dimiliki, mulai dari untuk menjaga pertahanan di dalam kota sampai perbatasan terluar Indonesia."Dalam situasi krisis atau perang, ibu kota negara tentunya akan diserang musuh dengan kekuatan penuh. Karena itu pembangunan sistem pertahanan ibu kota negara merupakan hal mutlak bagi Indonesia," kata Panglima TNI dalam RDP dengan Komisi I di Gedung Nusantara II, Kompleks Parlemen Senayan Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019).Hadi mengutarakan, untuk persiapan pindah Ibu Kota Negara, akan ada relokasi personel TNI ke Kalimantan Timur (Kaltim). Dirinya lantas menginginkan penempatan ada di Penajam Paser Utara, agar berdekatan dengan Istana Kepresidenan, MPR, DPR, DPD RI, kementerian/lembaga negara dan kedutaan negara sahabat.Menurut Hadi, ada beberapa hal di bidang pertahanan yang perlu menjadi perhatian. Terutama pemberlakuan Air Defence Identification Zone (Adis) daerah terbatas dan terlarang (restricted and prohibited area) sesuai Peraturan Pemerintah Nomor 4/2018 Tentang Pengamanan Wilayah Udara Republik Indonesia.Menurut dia, perlu gelar kekuatan militer yang mampu menghadapi segala bentuk ancaman. Pembangunan sistem pertahanan penangkal serangan rudal, pesawat udara musuh, roket, infiltran sabotase siber, ancaman chemical biology dan radioaktif, sampai ancaman serangan nuklir, perlu diperhatikan saat memasuki Ibu Kota baru. Berikutnya, Ibu Kota Negara yang baru harus memiliki jalur terdekat mobilisasi kekuatan militer baik aspek darat, laut, udara, sebagai persiapan rencana kontijensi dan rute evakuasi VVIP.Percepatan pengadaan atau melengkapi Alutsista adalah lanjutan dari rencana kerja strategis (renstra) ketiga 2019-2024. Dan salah satu yang dibutuhkan menurut Panglima TNI adalah kapal selam. Kemudian, dalam rencana kerjanya, kepada Komisi I DPR RI, Panglima TNI beserta seluruh pimpinan tiga matra sudah menyampaikan paparan lengkap soal pembangunan markas serta peralatan kantor untuk di Penajam Paser Utara. Dibutuhkan anggaran yang tidak sedikit menurut Hadi, dan sudah disampaikan kepada Komisi I.Pembentukan organisasi baru yaitu Komando Operasi Khusus (Koopsus) TNI yang diperuntukkan menangani aksi terorisme lantas menjadi sasaran pembahasan Panglima TNI selanjutnya. Koopsus TNI itu juga nantinya membutuhkan peralatan termasuk pelatihan untuk para personel yang dilibatkan dalam satu wadah Koopsus.Kepada Komisi I, Hadi lantas memastikan kesiapan TNI dan personel berikut perlengkapannya guna pengamanan Pilkada Serentak 2020 mendatang. "Untuk mengamankan pelaksanaan Pilkada serentak guna perbantuan kepada Polri sesuai dengan Undang-Undang dan aturan yang berlaku," pungkas Hadi dalam RDP. (Sumber: Jorike Fitri/RRI-PRO3)

TNI Commander Asks TNI Headquarters in Sharpeners and Alutsista Modernization
Nov 6, 2019, 22:43 by Miechell Octovy Koagouw



TNI Commander Asks TNI Headquarters in Sharpeners and Alutsista Modernization



TNI Commander Asks TNI Headquarters in Sharpeners and Alutsista Modernization


KBRN, Jakarta: TNI Commander Marshal Hadi Tjahjanto accompanied by Army Chief of Staff (KSAD) General TNI Andika Perkasa, Navy Chief of Staff (KSAL) Admiral TNI Siwi Sukma Adji, as well as Air Force Chief of Staff (KSAU) Marshal Yuyu Sutisna, attended the Public Hearing (KSAL) Chief of Staff Admiral TNI Siwi Sukma Adji, as well as the Air Force Chief of Staff (KSAU) TNI Marshal Yuyu Sutisna, attending a hearing. RDP) with the House of Representatives Commission I. On the occasion of the RDP, Wednesday (11/06/2019) afternoon, the TNI Commander explained the concept of the defense system in the new State Capital which had to be carefully prepared. Because, he saw if he had to face a war situation, the Capital City would be the target of enemy attacks. In addition, there are also a number of defense equipment owned, ranging from maintaining defense in the city to the outer border of Indonesia. "In a crisis or war situation, the national capital will certainly be attacked by the enemy in full force. Therefore the development of the national capital defense system is absolute thing for Indonesia, "said the TNI Commander in the RDP with Commission I in Nusantara II Building, Parliament Complex Senayan Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019). Had said, in preparation for moving the National Capital, there would be relocation of TNI personnel to Kalimantan East (East Kalimantan). He then wants the placement in Penajam Paser Utara, to be close to the Presidential Palace, MPR, DPR, DPD RI, ministries / state institutions and embassies of friendly countries. According to Hadi, there are several things in the defense field that need attention. Especially the application of the Air Defense Identification Zone (Adis) of restricted and prohibited areas in accordance with Government Regulation No. 4/2018 concerning Safeguarding the Republic of Indonesia's Airspace. According to him, a military force needed to be able to deal with all forms of threats. The development of defense systems against missile attacks, enemy aircraft, rockets, cyber sabotage infiltrators, chemical biology and radioactive threats, to the threat of nuclear attack, need to be considered when entering a new capital. Next, the new National Capital must have the closest route of mobilization of military forces both in land, sea, air aspects, as a preparation for contingency plans and evacuation routes for VVIP. The procurement procurement or completing Alutsista is a continuation of the third strategic work plan (renstra) 2019-2024. And one that is needed according to the TNI Commander is a submarine. Then, in its work plan, to the House of Representatives Commission I, the Armed Forces Commander and all the leaders of the three dimensions had delivered a complete description of the construction of headquarters and office equipment for North Penajam Paser. A significant budget is needed according to Hadi, and it has been submitted to Commission I. The formation of a new organization, the TNI Special Operations Command (Koopsus) which is intended to deal with acts of terrorism, is then the subject of further discussion by the TNI Commander. The TNI Coopsus will also need equipment including training for personnel involved in a Koopsus forum. To Commission I, Hadi then ensured the readiness of the TNI and personnel and their equipment for the upcoming simultaneous elections of the 2020 elections. "To secure the simultaneous local elections for assistance to the National Police in accordance with the applicable laws and regulations," concluded Hadi in the RDP. (Source: Jorike Fitri / RRI-PRO3)
